long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
There are gaps in the existing Klipfolio webapp in the area of "connecting the dots" in their object model.  This extension enhances the Klipfolio UI with additional data obtained from their API.

* Requirements *
A Klipfolio API key is required and must be configured for this extension to  work.

* Current Features *
Enhance Data Source Details page

The data source page does not provide the technical details for the data source. E.g. What endpoint is used by my FTP data source?

There are 3 basic fields provided with each data source:
    Connector
    Format
    Refresh interval

There are also additional properties provided based on these connector types
    ftp
    google_analytics
    hubspot
    local
    simple_rest
    salesforce


This extension is provided as-is.  It is not provided by the Klipfolio company and it is not provided as part of the Klipfolio product.
